_sText:
Ported from JBMod.

This is a singleplayer map, you cannot play it with friends. Also you can't save it like hl2 save, make screenshots. Join T team to start drawing.

Download for JBMod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/453512 or https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2925598745

---

A simple map where you can draw anything.
24 default MS Paint colors, grid, filling with selected color, toggling crosshair, camera for screenshots, calm music.
